import React, {Component} from "react"; import Web3 from "web3"; import tether from '../tether.png' /* have form wrapped as a card form has spacing ect in form have label float left and right within the label b tag is bold */ class main extends Component{ //note createing a table with table head and table rows with table cells render(){ return (

Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.tetherBalance,'ether')}
